accuracy.description: The correctness of the answers provided by the multi-agent system.

completeness.description: The extent to which all required steps are successfully completed.

reasoning_quality.description: The clarity and traceability of the reasoning process used to arrive at the answer.

execution_speed.description: The time taken to complete the task from start to finish.

resource_efficiency.description: The amount of computational or other resources used to complete the task.

solution_reliability.description: How consistently the solution mechanism provides correct answers upon repeated trials.

novelty_of_approach.description: The degree of innovation in the methods used to solve the task.

explanation_quality.description: The clarity of the explanation provided along with the answer.
